content.html: ADHD makes us impatient, which makes emotional regulation harder. We don't just want to deal with our emotions, we want it to be dealt with NOW. And time shortsightedness means sadness seems to go on forever. We can't remember not feeling bad and so struggle to see past it.
content.value:
ADHD makes us impatient, which makes emotional regulation harder.

We don't just want to deal with our emotions, we want it to be dealt with NOW. 

And time shortsightedness means sadness seems to go on forever.

We can't remember not feeling bad and so struggle to see past it.
